queries.text: In case the Form MGT-14 has been filed for registration of anagreement, provide the following details as expressly set out in theForm MGT-14: (a) date of the agreement; (b) purpose for which agreementis entered; (c) subject matter of the agreement; (d) the authorityadopting the agreement (i.e., whether 'board of directors','shareholders', 'class of shareholders' or 'creditors')?
